en.title: {{HP - Hewlett-Packard}} Pro Series - Certified Technician
en.text: Earned certification as an HP Pro Series Certified Technician, demonstrating proficiency in diagnosing, repairing, and maintaining HP devices and systems. Recognized for developing a support tool that improved technical service delivery through the following innovations:
list: Diagnosed and repaired hardware issues in HP laptops, desktops, and printers
Replaced faulty components including motherboards, hard drives, and power supplies
Performed BIOS updates and firmware flashing for device optimization
Configured and calibrated printers and multifunction devices
Troubleshot networking and connectivity issues in HP systems
Documented service procedures and maintained detailed repair logs

en.title: {{SMAW}} - Shielded Metal Arc Welding {{NCII}}
en.text: Completed the TESDA NC-II certification in Shielded Metal Arc Welding (SMAW), covering a total of 268 hours of hands-on training over approximately 33 days. Developed core competencies in welding techniques, safety procedures, and blueprint interpretation for industrial applications.
list: Performed flat, horizontal, vertical, and overhead welding positions (1G–4G)
Prepared welding joints and base metals according to technical specifications
Used SMAW tools and equipment with proper setup, maintenance, and shutdown procedures
Applied occupational health and safety procedures in welding environments
Interpreted welding symbols, shop drawings, and material requirements
Produced quality welds in accordance with TESDA standards and tolerances
